DATAFIELD.name: TenSP
DATAFIELD.selector: #event-grid > DIV:nth-of-type(01) > DIV > DIV > DIV.product-info > A > H3

DATAFIELD.name: Gia
DATAFIELD.selector: #event-grid > DIV:nth-of-type(01) > DIV > DIV > DIV.product-info > P > SPAN.price-new.flexbox-content

DATAFIELD.name: img
DATAFIELD.selector: #event-grid > DIV:nth-of-type(01) > DIV > DIV > DIV.product-image.image-resize > A > PICTURE > IMG
